name: Veggie Salad
steps: Chop vegetables into small pieces.
Mix all vegetables in a bowl.
Drizzle olive oil over the salad and toss to combine.

name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add sliced zucchini and bell pepper, cooking until tender.
Combine cooked pasta with vegetables and top with grated parmesan.

name: Quinoa Bowl
steps: Rinse quinoa and cook according to package instructions.
In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, diced avocado, and spinach.
Drizzle with lemon juice and toss to combine.

name: Vegetable Soup
steps: Chop all vegetables into small pieces.
In a large pot, sauté onion, carrot, and celery until softened.
Add vegetable broth and diced tomatoes.
Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender.

name: Chickpea Curry
steps: Sauté chopped onion in a pot until translucent.
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Stir in chickpeas and coconut milk, bringing to a simmer.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.

name: Stuffed Peppers
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook rice according to package instructions.
In a bowl, combine cooked rice, black beans, corn, and cheese.
Stuff the mixture into halved bell peppers.
Bake for 25 minutes until peppers are tender.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes into rounds.
Layer mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a plate.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.
